text: 11 The DBMS uses the tuples’ pointer field to create a version chain per logical tuple. — This allows the DBMS to find the version that is visible to a particular txn at runtime. — Indexes always point to the “head” of the chain. Different storage schemes determine whereswhbat to store for each version. - _ A :\‘ 4 > >| "D 46:42 / 1:09:33 < Version Storage > - u m ¢ Œl DR E:‘.
